amendatorysection.catchline: Attorney General; legal advisor to commission; Auditor of Public Accounts; books; audit annually.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The Attorney General shall serve as legal advisor to the commission and, to assist him in the performance of his duties as such, may authorize the commission to employ special bond counsel.
(2) The Auditor of Public Accounts shall audit the books of the commission annually and at such other times as may be necessary.
